eventSummary:
Kraken is experiencing internal risk control triggers and compliance-related withdrawal rejections due to unusual account activity patterns. Multiple users report inability to withdraw funds and pending transactions for over two days. Kraken acknowledges connectivity issues with their mobile apps and is investigating the situation.
Sources:
- https://t.me/kraken_exchange_official
- https://status.kraken.com/incidents/mvxcxggzr92k
- https://www.reddit.com/r/CoinBase/comments/1lh3j5c/coinbase_withholding_access_to_funds/
